AF-JIRE: Center for Innovative Somali Language Resources

Welcome to AF-JIRE, your hub for comprehensive Somali language resources and research.

Our Projects

Somali Homograph Database

Our flagship project focuses on creating a comprehensive database of Somali homographs. This resource will be invaluable for linguists, educators, and language learners.

Status: Under construction. Check back soon for our growing database!

Open Dataset for Somali Language

We are creating an extensive, accessible open dataset for the Somali language. This dataset will include:

  • Text corpora from various sources (news, literature, social media)
  • Annotated datasets for NLP tasks (part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition)
  • Parallel corpora for machine translation
  • Speech data for automatic speech recognition

Our goal is to make this dataset freely available to researchers, developers, and language enthusiasts, fostering innovation and advancement in Somali language technologies.

Educational Games

We're developing interactive games to make learning the Somali language engaging and effective. These games are designed to improve vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension.

Pioneering Research

AF-JIRE is at the forefront of Somali linguistics research. Our studies cover various aspects of the language, including phonology, morphology, syntax, and semantics.

NLP Toolkit

We're creating a comprehensive Natural Language Processing (NLP) toolkit for the Somali language. This will enable developers to integrate Somali language processing into various programming environments and applications.

Get Involved

Contributions and sponsorship are greatly welcomed! Your support can help us expand and improve these valuable resources for the Somali language community. Whether you're a linguist, developer, educator, or enthusiast, there's a place for you in our projects.
